attributes.comment:
U.S. Citizenship and Immigration ServicesUSCIS-2006-0044

We have adopted our son from Guatemala and are interested in adopting another
child. We feel our son has the right to have a sibiling. If the fees are increased it
would just add to the expenses we already have. These children need good
homes and some people are really going out of their way financially to give them
that. Increasing the fees may put to much of a financial burden on adoptive
parents which would lead to the children not getting the chance to live in a
wonderful loving home. Please PLEASE do not increase these fees. Give us
adoptive parents a break on this one and support our choice to parent. We love
our chidren and love the children of the world. Please give us the opportunity to
better their lives and ours!
Thank you for your time,
Shelley R. King-Steimer
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Shelley King-Steimer
